TopicTitle: Why havent porkjet 1.2m rocket parts been integrated by now?

Articles.Content:
Well as the title says, all Id like to know is WHY these parts have been shelved by the devs rather then integrated in 1.4 (or even earlier versions) to replace the 1.2m rocket tanks and engines.  My biggest complain about KSP in general is how little visual improvements have been made (lets face it, outside of a handful of new or redone parts, no visual upgrades made it into this game after the porkjet spaceplane stuff happened), and literally the only way to make the game look any good is to use mods to replace some of the worst stock models with something thats actually pleasant to look at. 

 

So anyways, i know there are ways to integrate porkjet parts into stock (modulemanager configs), and i know there are other mods such as ven's revamp that will also make stock parts look better, but is there any good reason that the porkjet parts (which are all 100% finished, even if more of them were originally planned) never made it into the game officially even though they are as of this moment 100% complete in terms of 3D models being finished?  Id love to know that from teh devs, maybee there is a good reason that i just dont know, but as of this point it just makes no sense to me why not include art assets that are 100% finished in a game that has seriously outdated (and with a couple parts even terrible) looking 3D models.

There's no need for KSP to undergo visual improvements...but the new and old parts do NOT match each other.  It would be nice for them all to be consistent, and I too wonder why Porkjet's rocket parts weren't included.  I tried them out, they looked good, were a better match for the plane parts, and didn't seem to cause any issues so.. why not?
